title: The Interweaving of Past and Future: Escaping Mental Confinement.
first_phrase: This text explores the relationship between the past and the future, and how they contain similar elements. However, when the desired future is heavily influenced by the past, it can limit our ability to live in the present. The symbolism of the ouroboros, a serpent eating its own tail, reflects how our mental processes are closed-loop. To break free, we must develop awareness. The text concludes by discussing how ancient societies used planetary symbols to build their concept of time and how every person can be seen as a combination of active, passive, and neutral principles.
content: Nelle società più vicine alla Natura e più in contatto con il “tempo assoluto, quale era l’uomo prima della moderna evoluzione, i simboli delle sfere planetarie sono al tempo stesso delle parti del mondo corporale e dei gradi del mondo sottile ed una maniera con la quale viene costruito il tempo. Ogni uomo può quindi essere visto come un aggregato di più “metalli” o “pianeti” e questi a loro volta sono interpretabili come differente combinazione di un principio attivo, un principio passivo ed un principio neutro.
last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the principles of the active, passive, and neutral within ourselves can lead to a state of harmony and balance. By integrating our desires, abilities, and reflections, we can allow things to happen naturally. Ultimately, this approach can improve our overall health and well-being.
